message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is just too low for this product. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000. This is a very fair price considering the value it will bring you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $10,500. I believe this offers a good balance between value and cost for both of us.
